response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth $12,000 to you. However, I understand budgets and am willing to make a special offer. Would you be interested in purchasing this product for $10,000? This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a price that's still above its market value but below its perceived worth to you. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 10000}
